name: Lightning Jar
tagline: more digital and more mobile every day.
description:
A digital marketing agency with offices in New York and San Antonio.  Founded in 2001 as SiiTE Interactive and reimagined in 2015 as Lighting Jar. We were the first brand agency in the world to focus exclusively on providing digital marketing strategy and consulting services to Fortune 500, B2B and other top performing companies.
 With our emphasis on superior user experiences, elegant design, and digital brand experience, Lightning Jar plays an important role in helping forward-thinking businesses innovate in a digital world.
 
READ MORE...
